EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.SmartIPNet.none.N.G.N.14705.Smart IP Nurture campaign.Email 01
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet the world’s first multi-terabit processor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Meet the world’s first multi-terabit processor The FP4: Designed to expect the unexpected The cloud, 5G, the Internet of Things. Whatever the future holds, it pays to be ready.
That’s why we created the FP4 – a new 2.4Tbps network processer unit that’s designed to power the world’s biggest and most powerful IP routers.
Nokia’s breakthrough FP4 silicon innovation and proven high-performance routing software drives the 7750 SR-s series routers. With the FP4 inside, service providers and webscale operators can prepare for the future by building much bigger, safer and more adaptive networks without compromise. And that’s just good news for the world.
Discover the FP4 and reimagine IP networking in this video.
From the Nokia team. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
